content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DisconnectScopeFromOrigin path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/scopes/{scope_id}/origins/{origin_id} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name scopeid
desc a scope id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name originid
desc an origin id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum delete a scope origin
responses
title: 7_Configuration_DisconnectScopeFromOrigin_39.json
